name: The Air Canada Fleet - 2019 and Beyond
description:
Air Canada was founded in 1937 as Trans-Canada Air Lines, and has since grown to serve over 200 destinations on 6 continents.

Canada’s flag carrier and its subsidiaries collectively operate well over 300 aircraft, and I thought that this would be an interesting topic to discuss for today’s video!

Go check out Brandon's channel! ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWq8ksng53Nzi0iMA4_rE_w
